summary: This bill, the Preventing Recurring Online Abuse of Children Through Intentional Vetting of Artificial Intelligence Data Act of 2025, directs the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) to create a framework for detecting, removing, and reporting child pornography in datasets used to train artificial intelligence systems. The framework will provide guidelines for AI developers and data collectors. The bill also includes limited liability protections for those following the framework and tasks the National Science Foundation with supporting related research.
